messages.content:
U: Emotion note: fear. That is the emotional direction today around a handoff note. That is when it showed up after a fast decision. Keep it readable in one pass.
A: Should I keep it to two sentences or three bullets?
U: Keep it brief and avoid extra fluff.

I hear the emotion signal: fear. I will align the response to that emotion and keep it useful. Should I keep it to one question and one action? Next step: choose the smallest useful move in a handoff note. I can keep the same alignment and make it more compact.
